translation.AboutDescription1: I'm a self-developed Frontend Developer from Istanbul, Turkey, working in web development and browser games. I enjoy turning designs into clean, pixel-perfect, and creative code
translation.AboutDescription2: My goal is to create user interfaces focused on convenience, performance, responsiveness, and clean code. I have worked on many game and website projects.
translation.UIUXDevelopmentDescription: Crafting high-performance, responsive interfaces with clean code for user friendly experiences.
translation.WebsiteDevelopmentDescription: Building responsive and scalable websites with clean code for optimal performance across devices.
translation.3DModellingDescription: In my spare time, I love creating objects and characters. It is filling my lifelong passion for drawing, painting, designing, and building
translation.Name: Name
